endpoints.name: Get Invite
endpoints.description: Returns an [invite](#DOCS_RESOURCES_INVITE/invite-object) object for the given code.

endpoints.name: Delete Invite
endpoints.description: Delete an invite. Requires the `MANAGE_CHANNELS` permission on the channel this invite belongs to, or `MANAGE_GUILD` to remove any invite across the guild. Returns an [invite](#DOCS_RESOURCES_INVITE/invite-object) object on success. Fires a [Invite Delete](#DOCS_TOPICS_GATEWAY/invite-delete) Gateway event.
